title: Sustainability and Organizational Learning: Integrated Strategy Development Through Mathematical Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical knowledge, understanding of organizational management concepts, and familiarity with sustainability principles
context.additional_context: Optimization of smartphone-based mobile learning environments, analyzing sustainable management strategies using mathematical tools

learning_goals: Learners can design analytical models that mathematically represent the three pillars of sustainability (economic, environmental, social).
Based on literature analysis, learners can quantify the correlation between organizational learning mechanisms and sustainability performance.
Learners can validate improvements to corporate sustainability strategies through mathematical simulations applying critical thinking.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
